original_title: フェアリーセクター 　テントーBattle３
overview: Yuka who escaped from the front of Yellow Tento Black Tento, but realized that there was an opponent to fight in her heart, Yuka made an enemy to Yellow who fights alone and has no hesitation. No, now the fighting battle of Angry Bay begins.  Fight Fairy Sector Tento !!
title: Fairy Secter Tentoh Battle 3
